title: My Tree House
subtle: Descriptive (fiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: What can be found inside the tree house? My Tree House will spark students' imaginations with colorful illustrations and entertaining text as they climb up the tree house ladder and whizz down the slide with the main character. The book can also be used to teach students how to classify information and to identify and use nouns.
meta: cozy, deck, little, tall, view, window, wooden

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
